text: @maddow The GOP wants no data, no models, and no discussion of deaths from Covid19. Opacity is the order of the day, and they don't want their voters to know how devastating the disease is and how shitty the Feds' preparation was. Willful withholding of info. Criminal. Treason. 1984.
